text:
e="preserve">Michelle Veintimilla (born November 7, 1992) is an American actress. She is best known for playing Janie in the movie "Not Cool". She played the role of villain Firefly in the second and fourth seasons of the Fox television series "Gotham".
She played Carmen Guerra on FOX's "The Gifted" and Marie Joblanski on the Netflix crime drama series "Seven Seconds".
